item.title: 6 bodies recovered from Colorado dairy but no details released about the deaths
item.description: Authorities say six people have died at a dairy on the Colorado plains, but the circumstances of their deaths were not immediately disclosed

item.title: Drone attack destroys 16 trucks carrying UN food to Sudan's famine-hit Darfur region
item.description: The United Nations says a drone attack on a U.N. convoy set fire to all 16 trucks carrying desperately needed food to Sudanâ€™s famine-hit North Darfur ...

item.title: Police investigation continues into death of Hulk Hogan
item.description: Police in Florida are still investigating the death last month of professional wrestling icon Hulk Hogan from what the medical examiner concluded was ...

item.title: Orlando officials denounce removal of rainbow crosswalk near Pulse nightclub mass shooting site
item.description: Orlando officials have denounced the removal of a rainbow-colored crosswalk outside the Pulse nightclub by Florida transportation workers

item.title: James Dobson, influential founder of conservative Christian group Focus on the Family, dies age 89
item.description: James Dobson, who founded the conservative ministry Focus on the Family and was long a campaigner against abortion and gay rights, has died
